name: Crash cars
description:
RECOMENDED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Crash cars is a simple 2D-physics-game where you have to overcome ravines, waterfalls and deadly plants to reach the finish line.

Each level is a new challenge, each time more difficult, and with new deadly traps.

         

  • THIS GAME IS STILL IN A STATE OF DEVELOPMENT!

If you find any bugs in the game you can write it in the comments and I will try to fix it for the full version, which I hope to publish soon.

  • ESTE JUEGO ESTA TODAVÍA EN UN ESTADO DE DESARROLLO!

Si encuentras algún error en el juego puedes escribirlo en los comentarios y trataré de solucionarlo para la versión completa, que espero poder publicar pronto.

         

Enjoy the game! :)
